summary: A chest full of weapons and armour based on the Inheritence Cycle books!
descriptionHtml:
This is a chest full of items based on those found in the Inheritence cycle books (Eragon, Eldest, Brisingr and Inheritence).Â  It contains 4 sets of armour, and various weapons all listed below:
[b]
Eragon's Armour[/b] - full Dwarven set (heavy) [b]Murtagh's Armour[/b] - full Daedric set (heavy) the following stats are for both sets of armour:
Armour 106 defence
Gauntlets 32 defence
Boots 32 defence
Helmet 32 defence
Shield 64 defence
[b]
Arya's Armour[/b] - full Thieves Guild set (light)
Armour 53 defence
Gloves 20 defence
Boots 20 defence
Hood 25 defence[b]

Riders Robes[/b] set (light)
Robes 55 defence with enchantment that increases magicka
Boots 11 defence
Circlet 11 with magicka regen enchantment

[u][b]Weapons
[/b][/u]Tinkledeath - Nightingale sword with 100 damage and frost enchantment
Tamerlein - Orcish sword with 112 damage
Naegling - Elvish sword with 112 damage
Brisingr - Glass sword with 112 damage and fire enchantment
Zar'roc - Daedirc sword with 112 damage
Volund - Dwarven battleaxe with 90 damage
Eragon's Bow - Elvish bow with 54 damage and dragon damage enchantment (chest also contains 100 elvish arrows)
Riders Dagger - Dragon Priest dagger with 56 damage and small chance to instantly kill enchantment
Riders staff of flames - Dragon Priest staff
Riders staff of Sparks - Dragon Priest staff
author: Delka2010
